wikipedia.title: Craig Brewer
wikipedia.extract: Craig Brewer (born December 6, 1971) is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter. His 2005 movie Hustle & Flow won the Audience Award at the 2005 Sundance Film Festival and achieved commercial success, along with an Academy Award for Best Original Song, "It's Hard Out Here for a Pimp". He is also known for directing the 2011 remake of Footloose, and the 2019 film Dolemite Is My Name.
